channel.title: Please help me with questions about Whonix VDI disk
channel.description:
Hello. I have the following questions. Please help. 1. Is Whonix Workstation virtual disk image is limited to 100GB? I found that value in VirtualBox Whonix machine settings. It doesn't suit me. I need more space for Workstation. 2. What `owner:group` should be applied to Whonix `.vdi` disks on host? Should it be a username of your host machine or `root`? Is it safe that Whonix `.vdi` disk files have `owner:group` of host's machine username? 3. Wiki says that disk encryption should be applied on host's physical hard disk drive level not on Whonix virtual disk image level. Does LUKS suit well? Can I use it for full disk encryption on my host machine?
Thank you for answers.
